channel.title: Comments on: Creating MongoDB as a service on Windows 8
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: RajN
item.dc:creator: RajN
item.content:encoded:
when I try to stop the service using net stop mongodb, I get the following error.

system error 109 has occured

The pipe has been ended

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Can you check in the service itself, do you see an error?
item.content:encoded: Can you check in the service itself, do you see an error?

item.title: By: Milan
item.dc:creator: Milan
item.description: I have problem if I left service to be auto run on startup, only if set it to manual than it works as expected, any idea why?
item.content:encoded: I have problem if I left service to be auto run on startup, only if set it to manual than it works as expected, any idea why?

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: Would you be interested in having this featured to readers at DZone.come?
item.content:encoded: Would you be interested in having this featured to readers at DZone.come?
